hero.title: GUINEAN ESPORTS FEDERATION
hero.subtitle: Promoting and developing esports in Guinea

about.title: ABOUT FEGESPORT
about.description: The Guinean Esports Federation (FEGESPORT) is the official national organization for esports in Guinea. Our mission is to promote, structure, and represent Guinean esports at the national and international level.

join.title: JOIN THE COMMUNITY
join.description: Whether you're a player, a club, or a potential partner, find out how to be part of the Guinean esports movement.

about.title: About FEGESPORT
about.subtitle: The Guinean Esports Federation (FEGESPORT) is the official national organization for esports in Guinea.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: FEGESPORT's mission is to develop and promote esports in Guinea by creating a structured, inclusive, and professional environment for all stakeholders in the ecosystem.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to position Guinea as a major player in esports in Africa, building a sustainable, equitable, and innovative esports ecosystem that creates opportunities for all.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Our actions are guided by a set of core values that reflect our commitment to excellence, integrity, and inclusivity in esports.
values.excellence_desc: We promote and pursue excellence in all aspects of our work and competitions.
values.integrity_desc: We act with honesty, transparency, and responsibility in all our activities and decisions.
values.inclusivity_desc: We value diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive and accessible esports environment for all.
values.innovation_desc: We embrace innovation and constantly seek to improve and evolve the Guinean esports ecosystem.

membership.title: Become a Member
membership.subtitle: Join FEGESPORT and participate in the development of Guinean esports. Discover our different membership options tailored to your needs.

why_join.title: Why Join Us?
why_join.recognition_desc: Official status recognized by FEGESPORT and its international partners
why_join.network_desc: Access to a network of Guinean and international esports stakeholders
why_join.competitions_desc: Participation in official FEGESPORT tournaments and events

form.title: Membership Form
form.success: Your membership has been successfully finalized!

questions.title: Questions?
questions.description: Our team is available to answer all your questions about FEGESPORT membership.

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Stay informed about the latest news in Guinean esports and FEGESPORT activities.

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Discover upcoming esports events organized by FEGESPORT.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Discover the organizations that support us in developing esports in Guinea.

benefits.title: Partnership Benefits
benefits.visibility_desc: Presence on all our communication materials and events
benefits.network_desc: Access to our network of partners and esports stakeholders

process.title: Partnership Process
process.contact_desc: Let's discuss your goals and explore collaboration possibilities.
process.proposal_desc: We develop a proposal tailored to your needs and objectives.
process.finalization_desc: We define the partnership terms together.
process.activation_desc: Implementation of the partnership and start of activations.

resources.title: Resource Center
resources.subtitle: Access our library of documents, guides, and resources for the development of esports in Guinea.

other.title: Other Resources
other.media_desc: Official FEGESPORT photos, videos, and assets
other.branding_desc: FEGESPORT logos, colors, and brand elements

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to listen. Don't hesitate to contact us with any questions about FEGESPORT or esports in Guinea.

community.title: Our Community
community.subtitle: Discover the active members of FEGESPORT: players, clubs, and partners who bring Guinean esports to life.

newsletter.title: Stay Informed
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news, events, and updates from FEGESPORT directly to your email and WhatsApp.
newsletter.accept: I agree to receive notifications by email and WhatsApp
